1: A Song of Ascents. Happy is everyone in awe of Adonai, who walks in His ways,
2: for you will eat the labor of your hands. You will be blessed and it will be good for you.
3: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house. Your children will be like olive saplings around your table.
4: Behold, thus will the man be blessed who fears Adonai.
5: May Adonai bless you out of Zion, and may you see Jerusalem in prosperity all the days of your life,
6: and may you live to see your children's children. Shalom be upon Israel!
